thread.title: InventHelp Accessory Allows For More Private Phone Conversations (DVR-863)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Accessory Allows For More Private Phone Conversations (DVR-863) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Accessory Allows For More Private Phone Conversations (DVR-863)
text:
Based in Pittsburgh, Pa., InventHelp is submitting the Phone Accessory for Privacy to companies for their potential consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Having to use a phone in work situations raises the risk of being overheard and disturbing others, especially in offices with cubicles. "In order to solve this problem, I designed the patent-pending Phone Accessory for Privacy," said an inventor from Aurora, Colo.
This accessory makes phone conversations in work situations more private, and it avoids disturbing others. As a result, it promotes productivity and improves customer service. Easy to use and producible in different colors, designs and logos, as well as a version for headsets, the accessory is ideal for service reps, call centers, warranty reps, help lines, etc.
The original design was submitted to the Denver office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-DVR-863, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
